NCS with The Challenge
The Challenge Bulletin
NCS with The Challenge - another fantastic year!
Thanks to your partnership we were able to recruit over 2,500 enthusiastic and motivated staff members for our summer programme. All in all, a massive number of 18 students from Aston University were successful in securing a role with us this summer!
NCS with The Challenge would not be the incredible experience it is for young people, were it not for our summer staff. Your contribution made a real difference.
We wanted to share some comments from the young people about our staff:
"I've met some absolutely brill people... Our mentor is one of the best people on the programme"
"Thank you NCS with The Challenge for such a wonderful experience!! It is something I will value and look back on for the rest of my life. Our team mentor, has been amazing... hasn't just treated us like children."
Please let us know of any upcoming events and opportunities. We look forward to working with you again in 2015.
